name: Reflections
description: Reflections is the third jj Poem book. You will want to add this one to your collection. Reflections examines life's conditions and sheds light on who we are. Reflections show us how we are becoming what we were meant to be.

name: Second Chances
description: The third jj book is a collection of short stories. Each story points to the grace and love God extends and shows how He is a God of second chances. Join jj and special guest writer, Jeremiah Chapman, as they explore the possible impossibilities of a God who continues to reach out to His children, even when everything seems so broken. See how God can and will use any situation and turn it around for His glory.

name: Wind Dances & Sky Portraits
description: jj has done it again... Another collection of pro's and poems to warm the heart, feed the soul, and remind you that you are precious. Jon has a unique way of painting portraits with words that will lift you up when you are down, create a smile when there are frowns, and cause the heart to dance.
